data.partBlankContent: Abraham Baldwin was born at Guilford, Connecticut. After atte_____ a lo___ village sch___, Abraham graduated fr__ Yale University in nea___ New Haven in 1772. Three ye___ later, he bec___ a mini____ and tu___ at t__ college. He held that position until 1779.
data.fullContent: Abraham Baldwin was born at Guilford, Connecticut. After attending a local village school, Abraham graduated from Yale University in nearby New Haven in 1772. Three years later, he became a minister and tutor at the college. He held that position until 1779.
data.answer: 亚伯拉罕·鲍德温出生在康涅狄格州吉尔福德。亚伯拉罕在当地一所乡村学校上学后，于1772年从纽黑文附近的耶鲁大学毕业。三年后，他成为学院的牧师和导师。他一直担任这个职位直到1779年。
